The '''dB Cape''', or '''dannyBstyle's Cape''', is a personal [[cape]].

== Distribution ==
This cape was given to the video game music composer [[wikipedia:Danny Baranowsky|dannyBstyle]] as [[Notch]] was a fan of his music.<ref>{{tweet|notch|60980770084364288|@dannyBstyle also, you should have a cloak now}}</ref>
